tool_description: Thousands of recipes categorized by cuisines
name: recipes--cuisines
title: recipes--cuisines

api_list.name: Search recipes by ingredients
api_list.description:
Search Recipes by Ingredient
Search for recipes based on the provided ingredient(s) and optional cuisine.

You can pass multiple ingredients separated by a " , ".

URL:
/search/ingredient/:searchValue

Method:
GET

URL Parameters:
searchValue (required): The search term for recipe ingredients.
cuisine (optional): The cuisine type to filter recipes (e.g., Italian, Canadian, Mexican, Indian).
limit (optional): The maximum number of recipes to retrieve (default is 10).
checkAll (optional): Specify whether recipes should contain all (checkAll=1) or any (checkAll=0) of the specified ingredients. Be default it checks for all ingredients.


Request Example
curl -X GET "/ingredient/tofu?cuisine=Japanese&limit=5&checkAll=1"


Response:

Success Response:
Code: 200 OK
Content:
{
  "count": 1,
  "data": [
    {
      "_id": "6579de3cea366c4fee775349",
      "cuisine": "Japanese",
      "title": "Quick Miso Soup",
      "ingredients": [
        "1 tablespoon canola oil, or more as needed",
        "4 large shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and thinly sliced",
        "1 bunch fresh chives, chopped",
        "1 clove garlic, peeled and sliced",
        "½ (14 ounce) package firm tofu, cubed",
        "1 (14 ounce) can low-sodium beef broth",
        "1 (14 ounce) can low-sodium chicken broth",
        "2 ½ tablespoons white miso paste"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat...",
        "Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Ladle into bowls to serve."
      ],
      "category": "Japanese Soups and Stews"
    },
    ...
  ]
}



Error Responses:

Code: 404 Not Found
Content:
{
  "error": "No recipes were found that meet the specified criteria. Please consider adjusting your search terms."
}



Code: 400 Bad Request
Content:
{
  "error": "Search term cannot be null."
}


Code: 500 Internal Server Error
Content:
{
  "error": "An error occurred while processing the request."
}


Notes:
Ensure to provide a valid searchValue parameter for ingredient search.
Optionally, provide a valid cuisine parameter to filter recipes by cuisine.
Optionally, provide limit and checkAll parameters for customized search results.
Successful responses include a count of returned recipes and an array of recipe data.

api_list.name: Search recipes by title
api_list.description:
Search Recipes by Title
Search for recipes by title based on the provided search term.

URL:
/search/title/:searchValue

Method:
GET

URL Parameters:

searchValue (required): The search term for recipe titles.
limit (optional): The maximum number of recipes to retrieve (default is 10).


Request Example:
curl -X GET "/title/Chicken%20and%20Broccoli%20Pasta?limit=5"


Response:

Success Response:

Code: 200 OK
Content:
{
  "count": 1,
  "data": [
    {
      "cuisine": "Italian",
      "title": "Chicken and Broccoli Pasta",
      "ingredients": [...],
      "instructions": [...],
      "category": "Italian Chicken Main Dishes"
    }
  ]
}


Error Responses:

Code: 404 Not Found

Content:
{
  "error": "No recipe matching the provided title was found. Please consider refining your search criteria and try again."
}



Code: 400 Bad Request
Content:

{
  "error": "Search term cannot be null."
}



Code: 500 Internal Server Error

Content:
{
  "error": "An error occurred while processing the request."
}



Notes
Ensure to provide a valid searchValue parameter for title search.
Successful responses include a count of returned recipes and an array of recipe data.

api_list.name: Get category information by cuisine
api_list.description:
Get Recipe Categories for a Specific Cuisine
Get the count of recipe categories for a specific cuisine.

URL

/information/categories/:cuisine
Method

GET
URL Parameters

cuisine (required): The cuisine type to retrieve categories for (e.g., Italian, Canadian, Mexican, Indian).


Request Example

curl -X GET "/categories/Mexican"



Response

Success Response:
Code: 200 OK
Content:
{
  "count": 3,
  "data": [
    {
      "cuisine": "Mexican",
      "category": "Mexican Cookies",
      "recipe_count": 5
    },
    {
      "cuisine": "Mexican",
      "category": "Guacamole",
      "recipe_count": 36
    },
    {
      "cuisine": "Mexican",
      "category": "Chilaquiles",
      "recipe_count": 9
    }
  ]
}



Error Responses:

Code: 404 Not Found
Content:
{
  "error": "Invalid cuisine provided. Please refer to the API documentation to ensure that the provided cuisine name is valid."
}



Code: 400 Bad Request
Content:
{
  "error": "Cuisine parameter cannot be null."
}



Code: 500 Internal Server Error
Content:
{
  "error": "Something went wrong. Please try again. If the problem persists, try waiting or contacting support."
}




Notes:

Ensure to provide a valid cuisine parameter to retrieve categories.
Successful responses include a count of returned categories and an array of category data with cuisine, category, and recipe count.

api_list.name: Get cuisines information data
api_list.description:
Get Recipe Counts for Each Cuisine
Get the count of recipes for each cuisine.

URL
/information/cuisines

Method
GET

Request Example
curl -X GET "/cuisines"


Response:

Success Response:

Code: 200 OK
Content:
{
  "count": 20,
  "data": [
    {
      "cuisine": "Greek",
      "recipe_count": 187
    },
    {
      "cuisine": "Southern Recipes",
      "recipe_count": 210
    },
    ...
  ]
}


Error Response:
Code: 500 Internal Server Error
Copy code
{
  "error": "Something went wrong. Please try again. If the problem persists, try waiting or contacting support."
}


Notes
Successful responses include a count of returned cuisines and an array of cuisine data with cuisine names and their corresponding recipe counts.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipes-cuisines.p.rapidapi.com/information/cuisines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipes-cuisines.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://recipes-cuisines.p.rapidapi.com/information/cuisines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipes-cuisines.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get random recipes
api_list.description:
Get a random recipe based on specified criteria such as cuisine and category.

URL

/random


Method
GET

URL Parameters
cuisine (optional): The cuisine type of the recipe (e.g., Italian, Canadian, Mexican, Indian).
category (optional): The category of the recipe (e.g., Meat Pasta Sauce, Strawberry Smoothies, Chilaquiles, Indian Main Dishes).
limit (optional): The maximum number of recipes to retrieve (default is 10).

Request Example:
curl -X GET "/random?cuisine=Italian&category=Meat%20Pasta%20Sauce&limit=5"


Response
Success Response:
Code: 200 OK
Content:
{
  "count": 5,
  "data": [
    {
      "cuisine": "Italian",
      "title": "Grandma's Spaghetti Sauce",
      "ingredients": [...],
      "instructions": [...],
      "category": "Meat Pasta Sauce"
    },
    // ... (4 more recipes)
  ]
}


Error Responses:
Code: 404 Not Found
Content:
{
  "error": "Invalid parameters provided. Please refer to the API documentation to ensure that you are not sending non-existent values for cuisine or category."
}


Code: 500 Internal Server Error
Content:
{
  "error": "Something went wrong. Please try again. If the problem persists, try waiting or contacting support."
}


Notes
The limit parameter determines the number of recipes to be returned, with a default value of 10.
Ensure to refer to the API documentation for valid values for cuisine and category.
Successful responses include a count of returned recipes and an array of recipe data.
